6 enum Cbm8header {
7  CBM8M_HDR_MAGIC = 0,
8  CBM8M_HDR_VERSION = 5,
9  CBM8M_HDR_PLATFORM,
10  CBM8M_HDR_HWFLAGS,
11  CBM8M_HDR_FIELDS,
12  CBM8M_HDR_STRINGS
13 };
14 
15 enum Cbm8fields {
16  CBM8M_FIELD_SUBTUNES = 1 << 0,
17  CBM8M_FIELD_DEFAULT = 1 << 1,
18  CBM8M_FIELD_BINDUMPS = 1 << 2,
19  CBM8M_FIELD_COMMENT = 1 << 3
20 };
21 
22 enum Cbm8binDumpHdr {

24  CBM8M_BIN_FIELDS,

35 class CbmTune
36 {
37 public:
38  CbmTune(void);
39  virtual ~CbmTune(void);
40  int parse(char *fName);
41  void getPsidHeader(PsidHeader &ph);
42  virtual char *getName() {
43  return (char *) bufferPtr + CBM8M_HDR_STRINGS;
44  }
45  virtual char *getAuthor() {
46  return (char *) bufferPtr + CBM8M_HDR_STRINGS + strlen(getName()) + 1;
47  }
48  virtual char *getReleaseDate() {
49  return (char *) bufferPtr + CBM8M_HDR_STRINGS
50  + strlen(getAuthor()) + strlen(getName()) + 2;
51  }
52  virtual unsigned int getNrOfSubtunes() {
53  if (bufferPtr[CBM8M_HDR_FIELDS] & CBM8M_FIELD_SUBTUNES)
54  return bufferPtr[CBM8M_HDR_STRINGS
55  + strlen(getReleaseDate()) + strlen(getAuthor()) + strlen(getName()) + 3];
56  else
57  return 0;
58  }
59  virtual unsigned int getDefaultSubtune() {
60  if (bufferPtr[CBM8M_HDR_FIELDS] & CBM8M_FIELD_DEFAULT)
61  return bufferPtr[CBM8M_HDR_FIELDS
62  + 1
63  + strlen(getReleaseDate()) + strlen(getAuthor()) + strlen(getName()) + 3];
64  else
65  return 0;
66  }

72  // else

75  virtual unsigned short getInitAddress(unsigned int nr) {
76  //return *((unsigned short *) (bufferPtr + dataIndex + 4));
77  return initAddress;
78  }
79  virtual unsigned short getPlayAddress(unsigned int nr) {
80  //return *((unsigned short *) (bufferPtr + dataIndex + 2));
81  return playAddress;
82  }
83  virtual unsigned short getDumpLength(unsigned int nr) {
84  return dumpLength;
85  }
86  virtual unsigned short getLoadAddress(unsigned int nr) {
87  //return *((unsigned short *) (bufferPtr + dataIndex + 4));
88  return loadAddress;
89  }
90  virtual unsigned char *getBinaryData(unsigned int nr) {
91  //return (bufferPtr + dataIndex + 6);
92  return (bufferPtr + dataIndex );
93  }

96  FILE *file;
